title: Central Hub: Applications
excerpt: Streamlining remote setup management with a custom ZeroTier-hosted PWA.
author: Codem
content:
Project Overview

Using ZeroTier and an npm js server, I decided it was time to upgrade my central hub. Managing everything via Google Drive and multiple shortcuts for command files was becoming a tedious process.

Streamlined Workflow

I developed a futuristic application using HTML and hosted it over a ZeroTier VPN. To make access seamless, I converted it into a PWA using my Android Studio JSON template, allowing for a fully functional mobile experience.

Features and Integration

Sending commands to my home setup is now effortless. I have implemented a live view of the first four files in both the confirmation and output folders of the mounted Google Drive, providing real-time visibility of processing and output files directly in the hub.

You can check out my portfolio to see more of my projects.
